item.title: AI’s biggest obstacle? Data reliability. Astronomer’s new platform tackles the challenge
item.description: Astronomer launches Astro Observe, an AI-powered data observability platform that combines orchestration and monitoring.

item.title: SAP integrates Databricks to enhance AI readiness with new Business Data Cloud
item.description: SAP's Databricks-powered Business Data Cloud will give teams a faster, simpler way to unify and mobilize their business data assets.

item.title: PIN AI launches mobile app letting you make your own personalized, private DeepSeek or Llama-powered AI model on your phone
item.description: PIN AI told VentureBeat they will make money by charging transaction fees for other AI agents to access users' information.

item.title: Don’t sleep on Google Gemini’s Deep Research mode: 8 examples of informative reports
item.description: Use Gemini Deep Research to produce industry reports or ask it to identify new opportunities or helpful insights to grow your business.

item.title: Taking AI to the playground: LinkedIn combines LLMs, LangChain and Jupyter Notebooks to improve prompt engineering
item.description: LinkedIn's collaborative prompt engineering playground helps bridge the gap between engineers and product managers.
